docs.text:
Set-Up


Welcome to an 
Introduction to Python with Telegram Bots
. To begin, we must first set up the 
python programming language
 and the 
python-telegram-bot library
. 
Please complete these installation before the workshop.


Instructions for Windows and macOS operating systems follow
1
. If you run into any problems, you may contact through telegram:




@ningyuan




Windows




Download and install python3


Download and install python-telegram-bot




macOS




Download and install python3


Download and install python-telegram-bot












If you're able to run an OS that is not Windows or macOS (
ABSOLUTELY PROPRIETARY
), then I assume you can handle the installation by yourself. 
↩
